description: Defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for unit testing, which implements the interface 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell'. It includes mock method declarations for all virtual functions in the interface, used for testing components that depend on this shell interface.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface for unit testing purposes. Provides mock implementations of all interface methods.

methods.name: ~ServiceMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the ServiceMock class.
